Package edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core

Class Team

java.lang.Object
edu.bu.pas.pokemon.core.Team
public class Team extends Object
A class representing a team of Pokemon controlled by an Agent. A Team contains an list of Pokemon instances, the index in the list of the currenty active pokemon (i.e. the pokemon currently engaging in battle against an opponent pokemon), an Agent instance controlling that team, the index of that team in a Battle instance, and some additional information about the current state of the team in the battle:
  • The last move used by a Pokemon on this team. Moves like copycat allow a Pokemon to repeat the last move used by its team. This information is kept here in case the last used move was made by a different Pokemon who is using copycat. This is a really nieche situation, such as Pokemon A uses a move and then is K.O.'d. The replacement Pokemon, Pokemon B uses copycat, which should repeat the move used by Pokemon A.

  • The amount of damage last inflicted on a Pokemon on this team. This is to also account for a similar niche scenario for the move counter.
  • The amount of turns Light Screen and Reflect have remaining before their effect wears off. The protection these two moves give are not restricted to the caster Pokemon, they apply to the entire team (i.e. whichever Pokemon is currently out for that team).
See Also:

  • Move

    static class 
    Team.TeamView
    A read-only data structure that contains a deep-copy of all values present in a Team object **except** for the Agent.
